-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Extra foreign primops for primitive arrays
--   
@package array-primops
@version 0.1.0.0

module GHC.Prim.Array

-- | Prepend an element to an array.
consArray# :: Any -> Array# a -> Array# a

-- | Append an element to the end of an array.
snocArray# :: Array# a -> Any -> Array# a

-- | Insert new element at position.
insertArray# :: Int# -> Any -> Array# a -> Array# a

-- | Delete element at position.
deleteArray# :: Int# -> Array# a -> Array# a
